columns.name: zone_id
columns.description: Zone where the record is defined.

columns.name: zone_name
columns.description: Name of the zone where the record is defined.

columns.name: type
columns.description: Type of the record (e.g. A, MX, CNAME).

columns.name: name
columns.description: Domain name for the record (e.g. steampipe.io).

columns.name: content
columns.description: Content or value of the record. Changes by type, including IP address for A records and domain for CNAME records.

columns.name: ttl
columns.description: Time to live in seconds of the record.

columns.name: locked
columns.description: True if the record is locked.

columns.name: modified_on
columns.description: When the record was last modified.

columns.name: priority
columns.description: Priority for this record, primarily used for MX records.

columns.name: proxiable
columns.description: True if the record is eligible for Cloudflare's origin protection.

columns.name: proxied
columns.description: True if the record has Cloudflare's origin protection.

columns.name: data
columns.description: Map of attributes that constitute the record value. Primarily used for LOC and SRV record types.
